title: Plow Boy Tobacco Cabinet Rollie Zeider White Sox  SOLD

posts.post_title: Plow Boy Tobacco Cabinet Rollie Zeider White Sox  SOLD
posts.post_content:
1910-12 Plow Boy Tobacco Cabinet of Rollie Zeider, Chicago White Sox.

Just a bit of corner wear/bump, with a pin hole top and bottom. No creasing with no surface rub as often seen on these and a problem free back.

$700 OBO  Check, Money Order or PP F/F   Shipping included.

NO LONGER AVAILABLE
